meaningMnemonic: Take your <radical>spoon</radical> to the <radical>sun</radical> to be able to take a bite. It's <kanji>delicious</kanji>, you hear. That's the <kanji>point</kanji> of the spoon.
readingMnemonic: This <kanji>delicious</kanji> taste is... familiar somehow. You take a few more bites and then scream. It tastes like <reading>shee</reading>p (し)!
